snippet: The federal deficit fell to $1.1 trillion in the 2012 fiscal year, making it the smallest deficit since 2008, but representing the fourth year in a row that it has exceeded $1 trillion.
abstract: Obama administration says federal deficit has fallen to $1.1 trillion in 2012 fiscal year, making it the smallest deficit since 2008, but representing the fourth year in a row that it has exceeded $1 trillion.
lead_paragraph: The federal deficit fell to $1.1 trillion in the 2012 fiscal year, making it the smallest deficit since 2008, but representing the fourth year in a row that it has exceeded $1 trillion.

headline.seo: Federal Deficit for 2012 Fiscal Year Falls to $1.1 Trillion
headline.main: Federal Deficit for 2012 Falls to $1.1 Trillion
headline.print_headline: U.S. Reports $1.1 Trillion Deficit in ’12, A Reduction
